Banner.Description: Passionate about leveraging technology to drive innovation, I am a versatile and dynamic professional with a strong software development and data analysis background. I have expertise in programming languages, web development, cloud computing, and machine learning. Let's connect and explore how we can make a meaningful impact together.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: I am a dynamic Software Engineer fueled by a passion for staying at the forefront of technological advancements. With a focus on innovation and continuous growth, I consistently strive to push the boundaries of what's possible.

From implementing groundbreaking system enhancements to optimizing performance, I deliver exceptional results that make a tangible impact. My collaborative nature and leadership skills enable me to foster innovation and drive success within diverse teams.

With a proven track record of mentoring and inspiring others, I embrace challenges head-on , bringing fresh perspectives and innovative solutions to every project. As a growth-oriented professional, I am eager to make a significant impact as part of a forward-thinking team.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Engineer
Description: Working on a car scheduling app to automate emissions testing process pipeline, achieving 95% validity in car tests

Drove remarkable enhancement of the application by implementing four cutting-edge features: car test scheduling,test sequence editing, signup page creation, and calendar integration, boosting overall functionality by 75%

Implemented admin access for 90% of the functionalities using authentication guards, resulting in a 100% improvement in application security and a significant reduction in car information mishandling incidents

Experience.Jobs.Title: Desktop Support Specialist
Description: Spearheaded technical support to users in-person, over phone, and remotely resulting in 97% customer satisfaction
Resolved hardware/software issues for over 500 users, with a ticket closure rate of 95% within service agreement

Experience.Jobs.Title: Research Assistant
Description: Conducted penetration testing on microservices applications, leveraging deep learning techniques to analyze patterns and predict potential attacks, resulting in a system with a reduced risk of successful cyber-attacks by 98%
Deployed the DeathstarBench social network app on Kubernetes, achieving 100% functionality of the application
Employed Repulsive Grizzly app to conduct DDOS attacks, resulting in identifying 10+ vulnerabilities in microservices

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full Stack Developer
Description: Developed and managed an e-commerce web application utilizing Python's Django framework, guaranteeing both functionality and scalability, resulting in a 55% boost in website traffic and a 30% surge in sales revenue
Delivered customer-centric enhancements by implementing key features like add to cart and wish list, driving an outstanding 95% increase in customer satisfaction
Wrote REST APIs to perform CRUD operations, resulting in an API response time of less than 100ms and handling over 10,000 requests per minute

Experience.Jobs.Title: Independent
Description: Developed a new business website, leading to a 50% increase in traffic, a 70% boost in user engagement
Organized the CRM software by understanding KPIs, leading to a 99% improvement in customer satisfaction ratings

FeatureProjects.Title: Highlighted Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: TOM
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A Next Generation Car Test Order Management System application made from scratch with auth module, configurable graphics, configurable alarms, and user management. It also has feedback form logic for parameter configuration.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Driver Drowsiness Detection
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Revolutionized driver safety technology by analyzing drowsiness detection techniques, specifically focusing on facial features . Identified the most effective method with 95% accuracy

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Crazy Crypto
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Built a real-time updating app for prices, news, and graphs of cryptocurrencies, yielding an informative platform. Install this extension to see data in app.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Type-2-Heart Research Paper
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Uncovered novel insights into heart failure risk among diabetic patients using the Random Survival Forest machine learning model, unveiling previously undiscovered correlations with 90% accuracy.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Recommendation System
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Content-based recommendation system using machine learning for personalized content suggestions

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Mac OS Calculator
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A user-friendly mobile/PC interactive iOS calculator

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Yander E-commerce
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: An elegant E-commerce solution for heritage products.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Word Checker
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Searches if a word exists in a specific file or not

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: DeathStar
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Cybersecurity project using Convolutional Neural Networks on application built on microservices

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Organize
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Explaining file structure of node.js and Express application

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I would be delighted to hear from you if you're interested in discussing new opportunities.
